comments.content: Much better than the one we did with your old digital camera.

comments.content: Um, this one was also made with the old camera :P

comments.author: Alex
comments.content:
I mean old grey, plastic camera. The Konica? Or was it Olympus?
Not the Canon.

comments.author: rheide
comments.content: Ah, you're right. I used to take pictures with the 'supposedly best for IR' Minolta Dimage. It was way faster than the Canon, but the Canon is at least sharper and higher resolution. With the Minolta I didn't need a tripod though..
